messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] unschooling.info
messages.msgSnippet: Our server has had a major hardware failure. They are recovering everything from the old server and migrating it to a new server. I don t know how long it will
messages.messageBody:
Our server has had a major hardware failure. They are recovering
everything from the old server and migrating it to a new server. I
don't know how long it will take, but it will be back. I'll post here
when it is.

-pam

messages.subject: unschooling.info

messages.messageBody:
I haven't been able to open unschooling.info since last night.
Could someone who has the keys (as it were) see if there's a
problem? If it's open and fully functional, I need to see what's
with my browser or something. If it's not open, open it up!! Thanks.


Sandra

messages.subject: unschooling.info
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/31/2005 7:44:49 AM Mountain Daylight Time, brooksclan4@sbcglobal.net writes: I was a member of the Unschooling.com message board for the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/31/2005 7:44:49 AM Mountain Daylight Time,
brooksclan4@... writes:

I was a
member of the Unschooling.com message board for the past two years
(what happened there?) and have been missing the disscussion so much,
I tracked ya'll here.


===================

It's being revamped, they say.


Pam created another message board here:
_http://unschooling.info_ (http://unschooling.info)
and I hope you'll post there!

Direct link is this, but if you go to the one above you can see the
beginnings of the collection of articles and links too, and it's easy to remember. <G>

_http://unschooling.info/forum_ (http://unschooling.info/forum)

Sandra

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/4/2004 8:11:28 AM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

I emailed the owner and never heard from her... so I guess I'll forego that
particular discussion board. :-(<<<<<<

Hard to unschool when you're so easily dissuaded. It takes desire and
tenacity to unschool.

All message boards have quirks and glitches. There's human error as well.

~Kelly
